zar => shar <> sir

𒌋𒌋 Puzur in 𒌋𒌋𒀭𒈹𒂞 Puzur Šušinak
𒅤𒊭 Puzur in 𒅤𒊭 𒀭𒈹𒂞 Puzur Šušinak <> 𒉺𒋼𒋛𒃻 PA.TE.SI Ensi 𒅤𒊭 PÙ.šaʳ Basileo / Shar / Zar
